subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Condon, a Montreal Canadiens goaltender who went to high school in Belmont, Mass., is expected to start in Friday’s Winter Classic against the Boston Bruins in Foxborough.
snippet: Condon, a Montreal Canadiens goaltender who went to high school in Belmont, Mass., is expected to start in Friday’s Winter Classic against the Boston Bruins in Foxborough.
